verses.name: Psalms 9:1
verses.text: I will praise thee, O Lord, with my whole heart; I will shew forth all thy marvellous works.

verses.name: Psalms 9:2
verses.text: I will be glad and rejoice in thee: I will sing praise to thy name, O thou most High.

verses.name: Psalms 9:3
verses.text: When mine enemies are turned back, they shall fall and perish at thy presence.

verses.name: Psalms 9:4
verses.text: For thou hast maintained my right and my cause; thou satest in the throne judging right.

verses.name: Psalms 9:5
verses.text: Thou hast rebuked the heathen, thou hast destroyed the wicked, thou hast put out their name for ever and ever.
